pages.text: $(thing)Assembly Programs/$ must be inserted into the $(l:manufacturing/assembly_system)Assembly Controller/$ to tell it what kind of operation needs to be carried out. They cannot be crafted, but must instead be traded for; either from $(thing)Mechanic Villagers/$, or via the $(l:tools/amadron_tablet)Amadron Tablet/$.

pages.title: Drill & Laser
pages.text: The $(item)Assembly Program: Drill & Laser/$ is a little special. It doesn't handle both drill and laser recipes; instead, it provides a single-program method for two-step recipes which involve drilling $(italic)and/$ lasering steps, e.g. $(l:tubes/pressure_tubes#advanced)Advanced Pressure Tubes/$.
